form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: REQUEST FOR INFORMATION FROM NATURALIZATION FILE

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE REQUEST FOR INFORMATION FROM NATURALIZATION FILE (If N-585 is attached, fill in items 2, 3 and 6 only) 1. CERTIFICATE NO. To: 619589 65 PHI 2. REQUESTING OFFICE 3. DATE OF REQUEST 8/28/64 CB A 13 995 582 4. FILE NO. Herman Getz 5. NAME OF APPLICANT 6. REASON FOR REQUEST xx a. Derivative g. Application for Certificate, N-580 b. Lost Papers h. Denaturalization proceedings C. Special Certificate i. Birth Date d. New Name Certificate i. Information from Record - furnish copy of Petition Old Certificate submitted k. Other (Specify, indicate application Form No. if any) e. New Name Certificate Old Certificate lost or mutilated f. Visa Petition 7. NAME OF NATURALIZED PERSON AT TIME OF NATURALIZATION Solomon Getz 8. DATE OF BIRTH 7-10-1869 9. COURT (TITLE and LOCATION) Phila., Pennsylvania 10. DATE OF NATURALIZATION 4/27/15 11. NO EVIDENCE OF LOSS OF CITIZENSHIP APPEARS IN FILE 12. COMPLETE FILE FORWARDED 13. PHOTOGRAPH OF CERTIFICATE ATTACHED WVIT 0011 14. PHOTOGRAPH OF PETITION ATTACHED 15. PETITION FILED ON 1-4-15 SHOWS DATE OF BIRTH TO BE 7-10-69 SIGNATURE OF TRANSCRIBER M. Mapwell DATE TRANSCRIBED 8-31-64 Form G-347 GPO 892956 (Rev. 4-20-60)
